subScenes.name: 初次问候
subScenes.description: 学生向学术顾问礼貌打招呼并说明来意

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi, I'm Alex from Econ 201. Could I ask about exam registration?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨，我是经济201班的Alex，想问一下考试报名的事。

responses.text: Sure! What do you need help with?
responses.text_cn: 当然！你需要哪方面的帮助？

responses.text: Of course! Go ahead.
responses.text_cn: 当然，请说。

responses.text: Yeah, what's up?
responses.text_cn: 嗯，什么事？

qaPairs.usageNote: 用礼貌提问开启对话，避免直接问需求

qaPairs.speakerText: I'm not sure how to sign up for finals. Is it online?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我不太清楚怎么报名期末考试，是在线操作吗？

responses.text: Yes, it's through the student portal. I can guide you.
responses.text_cn: 是的，通过学生门户，我来教你。

responses.text: Yep, just log in and click 'Register for Exams'.
responses.text_cn: 对，登录后点‘报名考试’就行。

responses.text: Online only. No paper forms.
responses.text_cn: 只能在线，不接受纸质表。

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确问题类型，便于顾问精准回复

subScenes.name: 确认流程
subScenes.description: 询问报名步骤与截止日期

qaPairs.speakerText: When’s the deadline to register? I don’t wanna miss it.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 报名截止日是哪天？我不想错过。

responses.text: It’s this Friday at 5 PM. No extensions!
responses.text_cn: 本周五下午5点，过期不候！

responses.text: Deadline’s Friday — better do it early.
responses.text_cn: 周五截止，建议早点办。

responses.text: Friday. Late fees apply after that.
responses.text_cn: 周五，之后要收滞纳金。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用口语表达担忧，自然引发关键信息

qaPairs.speakerText: Do I need to pay anything when I register?

responses.text: Nope, it’s free for undergrads. Grad students pay $50.
responses.text_cn: 不用，本科生免费，研究生收50刀。

responses.text: No fee at all — just confirm your choices.
responses.text_cn: 完全免费，只需确认选课。

responses.text: Free if you do it on time.
responses.text_cn: 按时报名就免费。

qaPairs.usageNote: 区分身份确认费用，避免误解

subScenes.name: 确认与反馈
subScenes.description: 确认报名成功并索取凭证

qaPairs.speakerText: How do I know it went through? Will I get an email?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 怎么确认报名成功？会收到邮件吗？

responses.text: Yes, you’ll get a confirmation email within 24 hours.
responses.text_cn: 会的，24小时内会收到确认邮件。

responses.text: Check your portal — it’ll say ‘Registered’.
responses.text_cn: 去门户看，会显示‘已报名’。

responses.text: Email + portal update. Save both.
responses.text_cn: 邮件和门户都会更新，记得保存。

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动确认反馈方式，避免后续纠纷

qaPairs.speakerText: Can I print a receipt? I need it for my visa records.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 能打印收据吗？我需要用于签证材料。

responses.text: Sure! Go to ‘My Exams’ and click ‘Print Receipt’.
responses.text_cn: 可以，去‘我的考试’点‘打印收据’。

responses.text: Yep, PDF download’s right there.
responses.text_cn: 有，PDF下载就在那儿。

responses.text: Print it now — links expire in 7 days.
responses.text_cn: 现在就打印，链接7天后失效。

qaPairs.usageNote: 说明用途，促使对方提供特殊支持

subScenes.name: 礼貌道别
subScenes.description: 感谢顾问帮助并结束对话

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks so much for your help — you saved me!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 太感谢了，你帮了我大忙！

responses.text: Anytime! Just reach out if you’re stuck.
responses.text_cn: 随时找我，有困难尽管问。

responses.text: No problem! Good luck on your exams!
responses.text_cn: 不客气，祝你考试顺利！

responses.text: Cool. See you around!
responses.text_cn: OK，回头见！

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达感谢并开启未来沟通可能
